CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1 (enforcement delay);Violation of P1-1;Remainder inadmissible;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings against ORG and ORG of ORG ( ORG социальной защиты населения и GPE управление администрации PERSON области ) , seeking to recover unpaid child allowance for the period DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( Октябрьский районный суд г. PERSON ) granted the applicant ’s claims in so far as they concerned ORG and ordered the latter to pay MONEY ( MONEY at the material time ) to the applicant .
CARDINAL . No appeal was lodged and this judgment became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG Office of Arkhangelsk ( PERSON судебных приставов по PERSON району г. PERSON ) received the execution writ in respect of the judgment .

CARDINAL . NORP By letter of CARDINAL DATE ORG ( прокуратура Архангельской области ) informed the applicant that the unpaid child allowances were paid by ORG in turns , depending on the availability of funds .
CARDINAL . On DATE the amount due was paid to the applicant by ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG terminated the enforcement proceedings on the ground that the judgment had been enforced . As indicated in a letter of ORG of DATE , the delayed enforcement of the judgment had been caused by lack of funds .

CARDINAL . NORP On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the LOC court of GPE ( ORG районный суд г. PERSON ) against ORG and ORG , seeking pecuniary and non - pecuniary damages for the non - enforcement of the judgment .
CARDINAL . She claimed that ORG had failed to take the necessary actions to enforce the judgment and requested that damages be recovered from ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of Arkhangelsk refused to deal with her claim for lack of territorial jurisdiction . The court found that , since the applicant in her claim insisted that damages be recovered from ORG , she should have applied to the relevant court in GPE where the office of ORG was situated .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed an appeal against this decision which was received by the court on DATE . In her appeal she argued that , as long as in her claim she had indicated both ORG and ORG as defendants , she was free in her choice as to which of the CARDINAL courts , which had territorial jurisdiction over the defendants , to apply . Since ORG was situated under the territorial jurisdiction of ORG , she had chosen to apply to this court .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found that the appeal had been filed out of time and no request for leave to appeal out of time had been made . It advised the applicant to submit such request by DATE , indicating the reasons for missing the appeal time - limit . Otherwise , her appeal would be returned .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted such request . In her request she argued that she had not missed the appeal time - limit as the decision of DATE was received by her only on DATE . The appeal was filed on DATE , i.e. within the required DATE .
CARDINAL . The court scheduled a hearing on the applicant ’s request on DATE . The ORG submitted that the applicant had been properly notified of that hearing but failed to appear .
CARDINAL . The applicant did not comment on that point .
CARDINAL . Accordingly , by letter of DATE ORG returned the applicant ’s appeal on the ground that she had failed to comply with the instructions given in its decision of DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP The outcome of the proceedings remains unclear .

CARDINAL . According to Articles CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the Code of Civil Procedure ( Гражданский процессуальный кодекс РСФСР ) , in force at the material time , a court judgment , which has become final , is binding and must be executed .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL of the Law on Enforcement Proceedings of DATE ( ORG об исполнительном производстве ) provides that a bailiff ’s order on the institution of enforcement proceedings shall fix a time - limit for the defendant ’s voluntary compliance with the writ of execution . The time - limit can not exceed DATE . The bailiff shall also warn the defendant that coercive action will follow , should the defendant fail to comply within the time - limit .
